title: Unable to connect to server
body: Patch 6.9 was running smoothly for me. Since yesterday when I get through champion select and attempt to connect to the gamer server it goes bad. The screen turns to all black and eventually an error message saying I cannot connect appears. I have tried resetting my routers but nothing seems to be working.{{champion:62}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try running through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me, let me know if anything helps.

I'd also like for you to [run a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), just to rule out any issues that may be present in your client.
